lead_paragraph: It’s a marvel still, every time I make this dish, to recognize how the humble potato — the misshapen, dull brown dirty lump — can become this opulent, glistening, colossally elegant jewel with nothing more than attentive care, a sharp blade and good butter.  The potato slices want to bend and be supple but not be so thin as to be papery, else they will cook too quickly.
snippet: It’s a marvel still, every time I make this dish, to recognize how the humble potato — the misshapen, dull brown dirty lump — can become this opulent, glistening, colossally elegant jewel with nothing more than attentive care, a sharp blade ...

headline.main: On Your Way to Your New Year’s Self
headline.name: Pommes Anna
